pages.text: $(italic)In your search for the perfect tool, you've found that the Enchanting Table often doesn't do your bidding. Using this highly modified Enchanting Table should resolve most of the issue you had with your original one.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The Enchanter needs a focus structure to work.

pages.name: Enchanting Structure
pages.text: The holes have to be filled with $(l:magical_blocks/liquid_crystal)Liquid Crystal$().
Switch the basalt blocks with calcite and choose the gemstone blocks as you like it best.$(br2)You are able to enhance the Enchanter with Upgrades by placing them on the Gemstone Blocks.
